channel.title: Mebi County
channel.description: Mebi's personal site. A place where I'll show of my OCs and artworks.

item.title: Sunset style changed and new style
item.description: Sunset CSS colors changed to be similar to a sunset's colors and new CSS style, Mist of the Healing Lake.

item.title: New CSS style, changelogs history page added.
item.description: Added a new CSS style, Sunset. Changlogs history page has also been added.

item.title: OC pages updated, sitemap added, and website thumbnail
item.description: Nix and Benny's wiki page updated, sitemap added, and added a new website thumbnail!

item.title: Wiki page updates
item.description: Updated the OCs page and written the introductory paragraph on Benny's wiki page.

item.title: Stylechanger fixes and new OC wiki page
item.description: Images now change with the stylechanger and a new wiki page for one of my OCs

item.title: Site updates with Github
item.description: Site now updates with the Deploy to Neocities Github action.

item.title: Footer added and RSS feed
item.description: Added a footer bar on each existing page and also added a RSS feed!
